description:
Raoh`s legs buckle with fear under Kenshiro`s Divine Fist of the North Star Ultimate Secret Technique, the "Unconscious Transmigration".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Is It the End of Raoh and His Ambitions? The Heaven Hesitates Once Again!!
Raoul va-t-il tomber et son ambition avec lui ? Mais le ciel a encore chancelé !!
ラオウ倒れ野望果てるか? しかし天はまたよろめいた!!
